title: Rename knn Streaming Expression to knnSearch and add new knn Stream Evaluator
description:
The current knn Streaming Expression performs a more like this search to find nearest neighbors of a specific document. The ticket will rename the knn Streaming Expression to knnSearch.

This ticket will also add a new knn Stream Evaluator that performs the k-nearest neighbor algorithm on vectors.
